response.overview: Jennifer (Rachel Nichols), is tasked with caring for her ailing father Norman (Robert Pine) whose worsening Alzheimer's has emotionally weighed her down and begun to affect her work. She struggles to balance her two worlds of work and home life until her friend (Monique Coleman) suggests a unique idea that not only reconnects Jennifer to her father but allows him the chance to say good-bye to his long-lost love.
response.title: Real.Live.Girl
